headline: Linde: Jefferies remains Buy but lowers its target
summary: Jefferies confirms its 'buy' rating on Linde shares, with a price target lowered from $550 to $522.The analyst reports that organic sales growth in 2024 was around 3% below model forecasts, reflecting...
